com.opentok
Class Publisher

java.lang.Object
  com.opentok.Publisher

public abstract class Publisher
extends Object

A publisher captures an audio-video stream from the device's microphone and camera. Create a Publisher instance by calling the Session.createPublisher(Camera, Surface) method.

Nested Class Summary
static interface Publisher.Listener
          Monitors state changes in a Publisher object.
 
Method Summary
abstract  void connect()
          Connects this publisher to the session that created it.
abstract  void disconnect()
          Disconnects the publisher, if it was connected to a session.
 Publisher.Listener getListener()
          Returns the listener that was bound to this publisher by setListener(Listener)
 Session getSession()
          Returns the Session that created this instance.
 String getStreamId()
          Returns a reference to the Publisher's Stream ID, which can be used to identify the Publisher for this device in an OpenTok session.
 void setListener(Publisher.Listener listener)
          Binds a Publisher.Listener to this Publisher instance to monitor state changes.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

connect

public abstract void connect()
Connects this publisher to the session that created it.

See Also:
Session.createPublisher(Camera, Surface)

disconnect

public abstract void disconnect()
Disconnects the publisher, if it was connected to a session.

Note: Once you call the disconnect() method, you cannot reuse a Publisher (by calling the connect() method).

setListener

public void setListener(Publisher.Listener listener)
Binds a Publisher.Listener to this Publisher instance to monitor state changes.

Parameters:
listener - The Publisher.Listener that will monitor this instance, or null to disconnect a listener.

getListener

public Publisher.Listener getListener()
Returns the listener that was bound to this publisher by setListener(Listener)

Returns:
The listener bound to this publisher.

getStreamId

public String getStreamId()
Returns a reference to the Publisher's Stream ID, which can be used to identify the Publisher for this device in an OpenTok session. The stream ID is only available once once the Publisher has begun streaming,

Returns:
The stream ID associated with this publisher.
See Also:
Session.Listener.onSessionDidReceiveStream(Stream)

getSession

public Session getSession()
Returns the Session that created this instance.

Returns:
The Session that created this instance.
See Also:
Session.createPublisher(Camera, Surface)
